column2: My Bill Divider is designed to make it easy for everyone to split the bill.
If we have ordered different meals, we will have a difficult situation after meals.
Each person has ordered different price of food, but we may have to pay the same amount.
This makes unfair payments to someone.

column3: My Bill Divider makes it easy to solve such problems and to keep happy times.

column1: • push location_on on SALES TAX tab.
• My Bill Divider finds where you are now and tells you the sales tax.
You have to turn on the location service on your device. How to turn a location service on?
2. Search the sales tax by the restaurant's address.
Usually, a receipt has a restaurant's address, so you can find the state and zip code
• Push search on SALES TAX tab.
Put the state and zip code into the form like the below.
3. Find the sales tax on your receipt.
You might see the sales tax on your receipt
4. Calculate the sales tax by subtotal and tax payments.
You can find out subtotal and tax payments on your receipt
• Push attach_money on SALES TAX tab.
Put the subtotal and tax payment into the form like the bleow.
11,how_to_turn_a_location_service_on,"How to turn a location service on?"," <div>
• Open up Chrome browser and go to My Bill Divider
Push <v-btn icon fab small dark color=""green"" class=""ics-button-in-content""><v-icon>location_on</v-icon></v-btn>
Click the ALLOW button - The browser might pop up a new window like the below.
Allow permission to access a location service on this site.
Click lock on the address bar.
The location service might be blocked, so click SITE SETTINGS button.
Change the location access to Allow mode.
This manual may be vary by android phone models.
Go to Settings > Privacy > Location Services > Safari Websites.
Change the mode to While Using The App.
Open up Safari browser and go to My Bill Divider
Push <v-btn icon fab small dark color=""green"" class=""ics-button-in-content""><v-icon>location_on</v-icon></v-btn>
If the browser pops up a dialog like the below, Click OK button
This manual may be vary by Iphone models.
12,why_is_a_total_of_payment_different,"Why is a total of payment different?","<div>
We are trying to make sure to be same between your total of payment and our result.
However, every total of payment on receipts is calculated from different ways.
For example, one of the payments on a receipt is rounded up, something else is rounded down or just rounded.
As a result, we have decided to round the total amount.
The tip is calculated by a payment which doesn't include tax price (Subtotal).
